posts.ingredients: salmon, butter, salt, white pepper, cream
posts.descr: Put salmon in a buttered oven dish, add salt, pepper and cream, Bake at 200 degrees for 30 min.

posts.ingredients: flour, brown sugar, egg, milk, chocolate chips, nuts
posts.descr: Put dry ingredients together, mix, add eggs, milk and mix well. Add chocolate pieces and mix gently. Form small balls, put on the oven tray, remember to leave spaces between them. Bake at 175 degrees for 10 min or till brown.
